tool_documents.detect_anomalies:
tool: detect_anomalies
desc: Detect anomalies
capabilities: anomaly_detection, outlier_detection
params: df, column, method, threshold
outputs: dataframe

tool: segment_metric
desc: Segment metric by category
capabilities: none
params: df, segment_by, metric, agg
outputs: dataframe

tool: compute_distributions
desc: Compute distribution statistics
capabilities: none
params: df, column, bins
outputs: dict
tool_documents.compare_groups:
tool: compare_groups
desc: Compare metrics across groups
capabilities: compare, group_by, segment
params: df, group_col, metric_col, groups
outputs: dict
tool_documents.compute_time_series_features:
tool: compute_time_series_features
desc: Extract time series features
capabilities: none
params: df, date_col, value_col
outputs: dict
tool_documents.load_dataset:
tool: load_dataset
desc: Load dataset from file
capabilities: none
params: path
outputs: dataframe
tool_documents.sample_rows:
tool: sample_rows

capabilities: none
params: df, n, random_state

tool_documents.save_dataframe:
tool: save_dataframe
desc: Save DataFrame to file
capabilities: none
params: df, path
outputs: null
tool_documents.aggregate:
tool: aggregate

tool: compute_summary_stats

tool: compute_correlations

tool_documents.compute_percentiles:
tool: compute_percentiles
desc: Compute percentiles

tool_documents.handle_missing:
tool: handle_missing
desc: Handle missing values
capabilities: none

tool: parse_datetime

tool: cast_types
